channel.title: hpe pdu on Cray System Management (CSM)

item.title: HPE PDU Admin Procedures
item.description: HPE PDU Admin Procedures The following procedures are used to manage the HPE Power Distribution Unit (PDU): Verify PDU vendor Connect to HPE PDU web interface HPE PDU initial set-up Update HPE PDU firmware Change HPE PDU user passwords Discover HPE PDU after upgrading CSM IMPORTANT: Because of the polling method used to process sensor data from the HPE PDU, telemetry data may take up to six minutes to refresh; this includes the outlet status reported by the Hardware State Manager (HSM).
